dimensions.name: X
dimensions.description: X coordinate

dimensions.name: Y
dimensions.description: Y coordinate

dimensions.name: Z
dimensions.description: Z coordinate

dimensions.name: W
dimensions.description: W coordinate

dimensions.name: Intensity
dimensions.description: Representation of the pulse return magnitude

dimensions.name: Amplitude
dimensions.description: This is the ratio of the received power to the power received at the detection limit expressed in dB

dimensions.name: Reflectance
dimensions.description: Ratio of the received power to the power that would be received from a white diffuse target at the same distance expressed in dB. The reflectance represents a range independent property of the target.  The surface normal of this target is assumed to be in parallel to the laser beam direction.

dimensions.name: ReturnNumber
dimensions.description: Pulse return number for a given output pulse. A given output laser pulse can have many returns, and they must be marked in order, starting with 1

dimensions.name: NumberOfReturns
dimensions.description: Total number of returns for a given pulse.

dimensions.name: ScanDirectionFlag
dimensions.description: Direction at which the scanner mirror was traveling at the time of the output pulse. A value of 1 is a positive scan direction, and a bit value of 0 is a negative scan direction, where positive scan direction is a scan moving from the left side of the in-track direction to the right side and negative the opposite

dimensions.name: EdgeOfFlightLine
dimensions.description: Indicates the end of scanline before a direction change with a value of 1 - 0 otherwise

dimensions.name: Classification
dimensions.description: ASPRS classification.  0 for no classification.  See LAS specification for details.

dimensions.name: ScanAngleRank
dimensions.description: Angle degree at which the laser point was output from the system, including the roll of the aircraft.  The scan angle is based on being nadir, and -90 the left side of the aircraft in the direction of flight

dimensions.name: UserData
dimensions.description: Unspecified user data

dimensions.name: PointSourceId
dimensions.description: File source ID from which the point originated.  Zero indicates that the point originated in the current file

dimensions.name: Red
dimensions.description: Red image channel value

dimensions.name: Green
dimensions.description: Green image channel value

dimensions.name: Blue
dimensions.description: Blue image channel value

dimensions.name: GpsTime
dimensions.description: GPS time that the point was acquired

dimensions.name: InternalTime
dimensions.description: Scanner's internal time when the point was acquired, in seconds

dimensions.name: OffsetTime
dimensions.description: Milliseconds from first acquired point

dimensions.name: IsPpsLocked
dimensions.description: The external PPS signal was found to be synchronized at the time of the current laser shot.

dimensions.name: StartPulse
dimensions.description: Relative pulse signal strength

dimensions.name: ReflectedPulse
dimensions.description: Relative reflected pulse signal strength

dimensions.name: Pdop
dimensions.description: GPS PDOP (dilution of precision)

dimensions.name: Pitch
dimensions.description: Pitch in degrees

dimensions.name: Roll
dimensions.description: Roll in degrees

dimensions.name: PulseWidth
dimensions.description: Laser received pulse width (digitizer samples)

dimensions.name: Deviation
dimensions.description: Difference between the shape of the reference pulse and the return pulse. A larger value for deviation indicates larger distortion.

dimensions.name: PassiveSignal
dimensions.description: Relative passive signal

dimensions.name: BackgroundRadiation
dimensions.description: A measure of background radiation.

dimensions.name: PassiveX
dimensions.description: Passive X footprint

dimensions.name: PassiveY
dimensions.description: Passive Y footprint

dimensions.name: PassiveZ
dimensions.description: Passive Z footprint

dimensions.name: XVelocity
dimensions.description: X Velocity

dimensions.name: YVelocity
dimensions.description: Y Velocity

dimensions.name: ZVelocity
dimensions.description: Z Velocity

dimensions.name: Azimuth
dimensions.description: Scanner azimuth

dimensions.name: WanderAngle
dimensions.description: Wander Angle

dimensions.name: XBodyAccel
dimensions.description: X Body Acceleration

dimensions.name: YBodyAccel
dimensions.description: Y Body Acceleration

dimensions.name: ZBodyAccel
dimensions.description: Z Body Acceleration

dimensions.name: XBodyAngRate
dimensions.description: X Body Angle Rate

dimensions.name: YBodyAngRate
dimensions.description: Y Body Angle Rate

dimensions.name: ZBodyAngRate
dimensions.description: Z Body Angle Rate

dimensions.name: Flag
dimensions.description: Flag

dimensions.name: Mark
dimensions.description: Mark

dimensions.name: Alpha
dimensions.description: Alpha

dimensions.name: EchoRange
dimensions.description: Echo Range

dimensions.name: ScanChannel
dimensions.description: Scan Channel

dimensions.name: Infrared
dimensions.description: Infrared

dimensions.name: HeightAboveGround
dimensions.description: Height Above Ground

dimensions.name: ClassFlags
dimensions.description: Class Flags - deprecated in favor of Synthetic/KeyPoint/Withheld/Overlap

dimensions.name: Synthetic
dimensions.description: ASPRS Synthetic flag.  See LAS specification for details.

dimensions.name: KeyPoint
dimensions.description: ASPRS Key-Point flag.  See LAS specification for details.

dimensions.name: Withheld
dimensions.description: ASPRS Withheld flag.  See LAS specification for details.

dimensions.name: Overlap
dimensions.description: ASPRS Overlap flag.  See LAS specification for details.

dimensions.name: LvisLfid
dimensions.description: LVIS_LFID

dimensions.name: ShotNumber
dimensions.description: Shot Number

dimensions.name: LongitudeCentroid
dimensions.description: Longitude Centroid

dimensions.name: LatitudeCentroid
dimensions.description: Latitude Centroid

dimensions.name: ElevationCentroid
dimensions.description: Elevation Centroid

dimensions.name: LongitudeLow
dimensions.description: Longitude Low

dimensions.name: LatitudeLow
dimensions.description: Latitude Low

dimensions.name: ElevationLow
dimensions.description: Elevation Low

dimensions.name: LongitudeHigh
dimensions.description: Longitude High

dimensions.name: LatitudeHigh
dimensions.description: Latitude High

dimensions.name: ElevationHigh
dimensions.description: Elevation High

dimensions.name: PointId
dimensions.description: An explicit representation of point ordering within a file, which allows this usually-implicit information to be preserved when reordering points.

dimensions.name: OriginId
dimensions.description: A file source ID from which the point originated.  This ID is global to a derivative dataset which may be aggregated from multiple files.

dimensions.name: NormalX
dimensions.description: X component of a vector normal to surface at this point

dimensions.name: NormalY
dimensions.description: Y component of a vector normal to surface at this point

dimensions.name: NormalZ
dimensions.description: Z component of a vector normal to surface at this point

dimensions.name: Curvature
dimensions.description: Curvature of surface at this point

dimensions.name: Density
dimensions.description: Estimate of point density

dimensions.name: Omit
dimensions.description: Used to shallowly mark a point as being omitted without removing it

dimensions.name: ClusterID
dimensions.description: ID assigned to a point by a point-clustering algorithm.

dimensions.name: NNDistance
dimensions.description: Distance metric related to a point's nearest neighbors.

dimensions.name: TextureU
dimensions.description: U component of a texture location at this point

dimensions.name: TextureV
dimensions.description: V component of a texture location at this point

dimensions.name: TextureW
dimensions.description: W component of a texture location at this point

dimensions.name: Linearity
dimensions.description: Linearity of a point; larger values indicate more linear regions.

dimensions.name: Planarity
dimensions.description: Planarity of a point; larger values indicate more planar regions.

dimensions.name: Scattering
dimensions.description: Scattering of a point; larger values incidate complex (scattered) 3D regions.

dimensions.name: Verticality
dimensions.description: Verticality of a point; larger values indicate vertical structure.

dimensions.name: Omnivariance
dimensions.description: Omnivariance of a point; cube root of the product of all eigenvalues.

dimensions.name: Anisotropy
dimensions.description: Anisotropy of a point; larger values indicate strong variance in multiple dimensions.

dimensions.name: Eigenentropy
dimensions.description: Eigenentropy of a point; small values indicate more ordered regions, while large values indicate disorder.

dimensions.name: EigenvalueSum
dimensions.description: Sum of computed eigenvalues.

dimensions.name: SurfaceVariation
dimensions.description: Surface variation of a point; larger values indicate higher surface variation.

dimensions.name: DemantkeVerticality
dimensions.description: Verticality of a point; larger values indicate vertical structure (Demantke's variation).

dimensions.name: OptimalKNN
dimensions.description: Optimal number of k nearest neighbors, such that eigenentropy is minimized.

dimensions.name: OptimalRadius
dimensions.description: Radius corresponding to optimal k nearest neighbors, such that eigenentropy is minimized.

dimensions.name: Coplanar
dimensions.description: Indicator of whether or not a point is part of a coplanar neighborhood.

dimensions.name: LocalReachabilityDistance
dimensions.description: Reachability metric based on the NNDistance of a point's nearest neighbors.

dimensions.name: LocalOutlierFactor
dimensions.description: Outlier factor based on the LocalReachabilityDistance of a point's nearest neighbors.

dimensions.name: Miniball
dimensions.description: Metric capturing distance from a point to the center of the smallest enclosing ball encapsulating k-nearest neighbors, scaled by radius of the ball.

dimensions.name: Reciprocity
dimensions.description: Metric capturing percentage of k-nearest neighbors that also contain the current point in their k-neighborhood.

dimensions.name: Rank
dimensions.description: Estimated rank of neighborhood of points.

dimensions.name: Eigenvalue0
dimensions.description: Smallest eigenvalue obtained form covariance of XYZ coordinates in k-neighborhood.

dimensions.name: Eigenvalue1
dimensions.description: Middle eigenvalue obtained form covariance of XYZ coordinates in k-neighborhood.

dimensions.name: Eigenvalue2
dimensions.description: Largest eigenvalue obtained form covariance of XYZ coordinates in k-neighborhood.

dimensions.name: PlaneFit
dimensions.description: Metric capturing current point's point to plane distance compared to those in the same k-neighborhood used to estimate the plane.

dimensions.name: RadialDensity
dimensions.description: Estimate of radial point density

dimensions.name: BeamOriginX
dimensions.description: Beam origin X coordinate of current laser shot

dimensions.name: BeamOriginY
dimensions.description: Beam origin Y coordinate of current laser shot

dimensions.name: BeamOriginZ
dimensions.description: Beam origin Z coordinate of current laser shot

dimensions.name: BeamDirectionX
dimensions.description: Beam direction unit vector X coordinate

dimensions.name: BeamDirectionY
dimensions.description: Beam direction unit vector Y coordinate

dimensions.name: BeamDirectionZ
dimensions.description: Beam direction unit vector Z coordinate

dimensions.name: NorthPositionRMS
dimensions.description: North position RMS error

dimensions.name: EastPositionRMS
dimensions.description: East position RMS error

dimensions.name: DownPositionRMS
dimensions.description: Down position RMS error

dimensions.name: NorthVelocityRMS
dimensions.description: North velocity RMS error

dimensions.name: EastVelocityRMS
dimensions.description: East velocity RMS error

dimensions.name: DownVelocityRMS
dimensions.description: Down velocity RMS error

dimensions.name: RollRMS
dimensions.description: Roll RMS error

dimensions.name: PitchRMS
dimensions.description: Pitch RMS error

dimensions.name: HeadingRMS
dimensions.description: Heading RMS error

dimensions.name: Reliability
dimensions.description: Reliability (or confidence) of points

dimensions.name: EchoPos
dimensions.description: Difference in position of a peak of a return signal compared to a typical return from a hard surface

dimensions.name: EchoNorm
dimensions.description: Difference in shape of a return signal compared to a typical return from a hard surface.

dimensions.name: ImgNbr
dimensions.description: Stores the number of the image from which it gets the color.

dimensions.name: Image
dimensions.description: Index of the image use for texturation.

dimensions.name: Dimension
dimensions.description: Dimension of the points. three types of dimensions are available (Linear : points form a linear feature. Planar : points form a planar surface. Complex : random group of points).

dimensions.name: SphericalRange
dimensions.description: Range in context of spherical coordinates.

dimensions.name: SphericalAzimuth
dimensions.description: Azimuth in context of spherical coordinates.

dimensions.name: SphericalElevation
dimensions.description: Elevation in context of spherical coordinates.

dimensions.name: H3
dimensions.description: H3 index id

dimensions.name: Duplicate
dimensions.description: Indicator of whether or not a point is a labeled duplicate
